title: What to do against skins that buff the champion?
body: I was playing a game of LoL the other day and I was matched up against a syndra with the justicar skin ... (I don't know if she has a chroma pack but the balls were red) It was possibly one of the worst games I had ever had... I just couldn't see her orbs... If she put them in with her own red minions they were all but invisible and I kept getting stunned out of nowhere. I have played against normal Syndras before and I could see the balls easily but with this skin ... plis how can I change this? is there a way to contact Riot and tell them about the problem or do I need to switch to color blind mode? Thanks.
